titleInfo.title: Circuit Court, Stewart County, No. 50, State vs. Harper Vaughan, Subpoena

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

subject.topic: Vaughan, Harper; Vaughan, W.T.; Smith, Marion; Smith, F.B.; Townsen, J.A.

mods.note: A subpoena from the case of the State of Tennessee vs. Harper Vaughan, who was charged with tippling on Election day. Clerk F.B. Smith issued and signed the subpoena, which orders the Sheriff of Stewart County to have W.T. Vaughan and Marion Smith appear before the Circuit Court to testify on behalf of the State. Deputy Sheriff J.A. Townsen received and executed the subpoena.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
